1: <pb/><e>Bit yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Atac'al yich olan ayin ec'ok, cax chi walon in ba ayach, Mamin Jehová.</t>
2: <t>Mamin, abtek yul in nuk' xin, acbaj a txiquin yet chi el waw in k'anon a colwal.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, k'inalok ta tz'ibbil co yobc'ulalil oj, ¿macto wal txel ok tec'baj ba a satak?</t>
4: <t>Palta a ayach chi chaloj mimanc'ulal juj on, yet watx' ay elapnok yul co sat.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Yin masanil in c'ul chin mak jay a colwal Mamin Jehová. A alben chi waoc yin in c'ul.</t>
6: <t>Lanan in makon a colwal Mamin Jehová. Chin lajoc in makon yintak eb centinela chi yochej chi pet sakbi. Axca wal makon eb centinela tol chi pet sakbi, axca tu' chi wut in makoni.</t>
7: <t>Jaokab oc Jehová yipok co c'ul ayon Israel on ti', tol ay yabenc'ulal Cham, bekan c'ul colwaji.</t>
8: <t>A Cham ok on colon el yin masanil co mul.</t>
